publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-672 Ross Finnie: The Draft Producer Responsibility Obligations (Packaging Waste) Amendment (Scotland) Regulations 2003-That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that the draft Producer Responsibility Obligations (Packaging Waste) Amendment (Scotland) Regulations 2003 be approved. Supported by: Allan Wilson*

S2M-672 Ross Finnie: The Draft Producer Responsibility Obligations (Packaging Waste) Amendment (Scotland) Regulations 2003-That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that the draft Producer Responsibility Obligations (Packaging Waste) Amendment (Scotland) Regulations 2003 be approved. Supported by: Allan Wilson
